artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Variation of plain weave. Random double warps running together. Striped. Mocha
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Jack Larsen
medium: Linen, cotton, goat hair, mohair and wool
text: Larsen fabrics were known in the industry for using "unusual" fibers and yarns in the textiles they produced. The subtle quality of black goat hair in this upholstery fabric is enhancd by the choice of a relatively simple twill construction
title: Horsecloth
